data.message: Eminem wtf man stop bullshittin and let me hear you on the rap radio station again. I can only listen to Sirius in my uncles Mercedes. Plus I want to be able to feel that excitement of hearing your song on the RAP radio station and vibe out with friends and stuff. I mean come on man pleaaase use some new beats, and really old school beats. Just try, fuck that underground shit. Your Eminem you cant help but be famous. Thats out of your control, your the GOAT, stop being a COW-ward...Get it...Ik that sucked. But please bruh just try these new beats, and super old school rap beats. I just want to hear YOU on some and not these other idiots. You have enough motivational music to make the world go round. Now get off of that and get back on your grinding shit. That munching rappers up shit. Im not trying to coach you or nothing cuz ud eat my ass in rap any day but let the beat breath sometimes. Your not dumbing it down, your just riding it instead of crashing into it. Please bro put out some real rap shit man

replies.message: Oh my god u want Eminem to eat ur ass gross u just came to insult him I bet u ain't never been a fan
This some racist shit all the black people on here coming here to insult him

Wtf are you talking I have this dudes poster haingin up on my wall and I have all his albums. Why dont you take time to READ what I said before you start talking shit cuz clearly you dont even know what your talking about.
